question: In which motif of the RUNX1T1 protein is the rs34269950 SNP located?
ideal_answer: The rs34269950 SNP of RUNX1T1 is located in the 'RRACH' motif.

snippets.text: Of these SNPs only rs34269950 located in the 'RRACH' motif, the most common N6-methyladenosine (m6A) methylation modification site (recognized by FTO), was significantly associated with obesity risk and metabolic abnormalities.
